text: Brot-Dessous was a municipality in the district of Boudry in the canton of Neuchâtel in Switzerland. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into Rochefort.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 January 2016 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Neuchâtel
title: Brot-Dessous
